structure.unit: ARTICLE B. - WATER AND SEWER EXTENSION POLICIES

section.text: Upon the completion of the construction and laying of the utility lines as authorized by this article for connection, and upon inspection and approval thereof by the City, the dedicators shall be permitted to connect such private utility lines with the utility lines and systems of the City upon the terms and conditions prescribed by this Code. (Ord. No. 1985-543, §25, 4-16-85) Cross references: City Engineer to inspect water and sewer construction work, §6-1002; Public Utilities Director to review utility installations, §8-2062
